title: Chart Selection Helper
description: An interactive tool that helps learners choose the appropriate chart type based on their data type and the question they want to answer, featuring six common chart types with recommendations.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Data Visualization
Statistics
Education
learningObjectives: Identify common chart types and their primary uses
Match data types to appropriate visualization methods
Select charts based on analytical questions

controls.description: Select data type to filter recommendations
Select question type to filter recommendations
Hover over chart cards to see detailed descriptions
